result.html: Bhí mise óg tráth freisinI was young once, too.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mise óg tráṫ freisinI was young once, too.

result.eng: Once upon a time there was a king.
result.html: Fadó fadó bhí rí annOnce upon a time there was a king.
result.ponchtml: Fadó fadó ḃí rí annOnce upon a time there was a king.

result.ga: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheana
result.orig: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheana
result.html: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheanaI met Dara once already.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé ar Ḋara uair aṁáin ċeanaI met Dara once already.

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.orig: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain
result.html: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ponchtml: Ina ḋiaiḋ sin is breá liom dul go dtí an ṗictiúrlann i nGailliṁ uair sa tseaċtainAfter that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.

result.eng: I go to a film once a week.
result.ga: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtain
result.orig: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtain
result.html: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtainI go to a film once a week.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig scannán uair sa tseaċtainI go to a film once a week.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: I well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair aṁáinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: Liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
